settings.locale_changed: You have changed the language and are currently in preview mode. You need to save it before it can take effect permanently
settings.prompt_when_not_described: When there is no describe for a save, a prompt pops up
settings.prompt_when_auto_backup: When automatic backup occurs, a prompt pops up
settings.extra_backup_when_apply: Perform extra backups before apply (in the./save_data/game name/extra_backup folder)
settings.adjust_game_order: Adjust the display order of the game (settings need to be saved)
settings.name: Game name
settings.enable_edit_manage: Display the modify button in the management page
settings.default_delete_before_apply: Default to delete before restoring backup (applies to new games)
settings.backup_all_hint: This operation will back up all game saves, which may take a long time. Please enter yes to confirm
settings.apply_all_hint: This is a high-risk action that may take a long time. Are you sure you want to overwrite all game saves? Enter yes to confirm
settings.default_expend_favorites_tree: Whether to expand favorites by default

home.simple_explained: No useless features like promotions or banner ads, ensuring that the interface primarily serves functionality
home.safe_explained: This software does not upload your data to my server. You can configure your own WebDAV or other cloud services to achieve cloud save functionality
home.free_explained: This software belongs to the open-source world, and you can easily access its source code. Skilled individuals can contribute code to it
home.go_game_manage_hint: Please click on Save Management on the left
home.go_backup_hint: Please click on the game name under the Save Management section, and manage your saves in the new page

manage.error_info: This is an error message. It should not appear under normal circumstances
manage.wait_for_prompt_hint: When the game save file is large, the operation may take a while. Please wait for the success prompt before proceeding with other actions
manage.save_too_fast_error: Multiple saves cannot be made within one second
manage.last_backup_unfinished_error: The last backup is not yet complete. Please wait
manage.last_overwrite_unfinished_error: The last overwrite is not yet complete. Please wait
manage.no_description_warning: You haven't provided a description for this save. Do you want to continue?
manage.no_launch_path_error: You haven't saved the launch file for this game
manage.no_backup_error: An error occurred. It's possible you don't have any saves
manage.delete_prompt: If you are sure you want to delete, please enter yes. Otherwise, click cancel. This action will erase all saved game files and remove the game from the managed game list
manage.confirm_delete_prompt: Are you sure you want to delete?
manage.change_prompt: Attention, this is a risky function that is not recommended for use. If you are sure you want to modify, please enter yes. Otherwise, click cancel. The old backup will be preserved, but using the old backup will only restore parts that intersect with the currently managed files. If the game name must be changed, a new save management will be created, and the original save management will be preserved
manage.set_quick_backup_success: Settings saved. You can now use keyboard shortcuts or the tray icon for quick operations

addgame.duplicated_filename_error: This software currently does not support the appearance of files/folders with the same name
addgame.wip_warning: --WIP-- This feature is not yet completed
addgame.no_name_error: Please enter at least the game name and one save path
addgame.input_game_launch_path_prompt: Please select the game launch file (optional)
addgame.warning_for_save_file: Adding files or folders with the same name is currently not supported. Please refrain from doing so. If needed, please provide feedback, and I will consider implementing it
addgame.invalid_name_error: Invalid game name. Please avoid including special characters that cannot be used to create files

app.early_access_warning: This is an early test version. Stability cannot be guaranteed. Please use with caution

about.content_1: The software is an open-source game save management tool led by Sworld
about.content_2: The initial intention behind designing this software was to facilitate players in managing their game saves. However, due to the large number of games, it's difficult to adapt them all. Therefore, game paths can only be manually imported. If you're interested, you can try to contribute to improving this project.
about.support_me_content_1: You can click on the GitHub link below and give me a star. It would be a great encouragement for me. You can also contribute code and raise issues for this project on the open-source platform.
about.support_me_content_2: If you're a regular user, you could consider buying me a drink. I'd really appreciate it.

save_location_drawer.drawer_title: Below is the list of managed files

sync_settings.title: Sync settings
sync_settings.warning: Warning: Please read the tutorial before using this feature, as improper use may result in data loss.
sync_settings.always_sync_hint: Auto upload when adding or deleting saves. Please upload first when using it for the first time.
sync_settings.interval_hint: Set to 0 to disable auto sync (temporarily unavailable)
sync_settings.cloud_root_hint: Do not end with /, do not leave empty spaces
sync_settings.notification: If games are added/removed or settings are changed, you should manually overwrite cloud files. Multi end users should use with caution
sync_settings.start_test: Start testing. If there is no response for a long time, please check the settings and network connection
sync_settings.test_success: Test passed, the backend is available
sync_settings.test_failed: Test failed, please check the settings and network connection
sync_settings.unknown_backend: Unknown cloud backend used, please check settings
sync_settings.upload_success: Successfully uploaded, cloud file has been updated
sync_settings.upload_failed: Upload failed, please check your settings and network connection
sync_settings.download_success: Successfully downloaded, local file has been updated
sync_settings.download_failed: Download failed, please check your settings and network connection
sync_settings.confirm_upload_all: Are you sure to upload all backups? This will overwrite all files on the cloud, enter yes to continue
sync_settings.confirm_download_all: Are you sure to download all backups? This will overwrite all the local files, enter yes to continue

error.config_load_failed: Configuration file loading failed, possibly due to corrupt or non-existent configuration file
error.choose_save_dir_error: An error occurred while selecting the save folder
error.choose_save_file_error: An error occurred while selecting the save file
error.choose_executable_file_error: An error occurred while selecting an executable file
error.backup_failed: Backup failed, check logs for more information
error.delete_backup_failed: Delete backup failed, check logs for more information
error.apply_backup_failed: Apply backup failed, check logs for more information

backend_config.updating_config_body: The config file has been updated, and the old one will be backed up as GameSaveManagerConfig.json.bak

favorite.new_folder_name: Please enter a new folder name
favorite.choose_game_add: Select games to add to favorites (can be repeated)
